contentfulPagePressRelease.title: HEC Paris to Highlight Executive Education Programs at the Oman HR Summit

childMarkdownRemark.html:
HEC Paris, ranked number two worldwide in Executive Education by the Financial Times in 2015, will showcase its executive education programs at the HR Oman Summit in Muscat.

The fifth edition of the annual event will take place on 15 – 17 February 2016 at the Best Western Premier Hotel. As a much-awaited HR event in Oman, some of the foremost HR experts from Oman and the region are expected to share their thoughts and insights on HR, leadership training and development.

“As among the top-ranked educational institutions in the world for executive education, our core competency revolves around the development of tomorrow’s business leaders today,” said Prof. Laoucine Kerbache, Dean & CEO of HEC Paris in Qatar. “We aim to further close the skills gap within business organizations by supporting HR practitioners and professionals formulate, design and implement corporate knowledge and skills enhancement strategies that best serve their respective organizations’ goals and aspirations.”

In the advent of efficient and innovative corporate initiatives in Learning & Development (L&D), HEC Paris creates and delivers outstanding tailor-designed Custom Programs and bespoke executive management programs for Family Owned Business (FOB’s) that recognize the varying and unique educational and training requirement of every business organization. These programs are further complemented by short, high impact Open Enrolment Programs, Executive MBA and Specialized Master’s Degree in Strategic Business Unit Management (SBUM).

In November 2015, HEC Paris also took part at the HR Summit and Expo in Dubai, wherein it showcased its highly-ranked executive education programs to participants throughout the three-day event.
